portfolio.title: BlockVault
portfolio.description: BlockVault: Decentralized image upload on blockchain, Solidity for smart contract, React for user-friendly interface, IPFS secure sharing

portfolio.title: Habit-Tracker
portfolio.description: Habit-Tracker allows you to track your habits, set their frequency, and view your stats such as streaks and percentage of work done.

portfolio.title: Brain Assist
portfolio.description: BrainAssist is a `Second-Brain` application designed to help users efficiently capture, organize, and retrieve information. Built with TypeScript and React, it provides a user-friendly interface for managing personal knowledge.

portfolio.title: Ahen User-Side
portfolio.description: Ahen serves as a user-side interface for booking driving school sessions, akin to an Uber for driving schools. Users can easily find and book the nearest driving school sessions according to their preferences.

testimonial.description: Java developer with expertise in building robust applications, leveraging strong problem-solving skills for efficient software solutions.
Worked as Blockchain lead at GDSC PESMCOE, guiding peers, teaching, and fostering collaboration for impactful tech events.
Dropshipping: Navigated e-commerce challenges, managed inventory, and drove sales with strategic marketing and innovation.
